wikitext.*:
On [[7 April]] [[1971]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Randy Trimmer'''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=55600|articlename=Amon Dîn. January 1973|dated=|website=TB|accessed=7 January 2012}}</ref><ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 753</ref>
*'''Subject:''' Tolkien apologises for not being able to reply because he is working on ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
*'''Publication:''' The letter was reproduced in [[Amon Dîn (Vol.2, No.1)|''Amon Dîn'' (Vol.2, No.1)]].
{{references}}
